h1: Asbestos Survey Software for Accurate Inspections & Compliance
heroCopy: AbateIQ streamlines asbestos inspections by digitizing surveys, sample tracking, and report generation. Replace manual workflows with a system designed for NESHAP, AHERA, and OSHA compliance.
painPoints: Managing multi-floor asbestos survey workflows with disconnected records and inconsistent formats.
Sample tracking and chain-of-custody gaps that increase documentation risk.
Manual floor plan labeling and report assembly delaying project closeout.
Survey gaps (missing sample metadata, unclear locations) increase rework and documentation risk.
workflow: Capture asbestos inspection details by building, floor, and room.
Track ACM samples and chain-of-custody records in one system.
Generate floor plan-linked documentation and compliance-ready reports.
Standardize inspection inputs (material descriptions, quantities, locations) across floors and areas.
Tie each sample to location context, photos, and chain-of-custody for defensible documentation.
Export floor-aware reports with consistent labeling for ACM, samples, and areas.
regulatoryReferences: OSHA asbestos documentation practices for defensible records.
EPA NESHAP workflows for asbestos renovation and demolition documentation.
AHERA-aligned record management for school-related asbestos operations.
featureBreakdown: ACM sample tracking and chain of custody
Sample location traceability (photos, floor/area labels, consistent IDs)
Standardized inspection templates (repeatable fields and sections)
Defensible survey documentation (COC + lab report linkage)

faqs.question: Why does asbestos survey standardization matter?
faqs.answer: Incomplete or inconsistent surveys create regulatory risk. AbateIQ helps keep each inspection standardized, traceable, and defensible.

faqs.question: Can teams manage chain-of-custody records in AbateIQ?
faqs.answer: Yes. Sample workflows include custody details that remain connected to inspection and reporting records.

faqs.question: What makes an asbestos survey defensible?
faqs.answer: Clear material descriptions, precise locations, complete sample metadata, and traceable lab/chain-of-custody records. AbateIQ standardizes these elements so reports stay consistent.

faqs.question: Does AbateIQ help with floor plan labeling?
faqs.answer: Yes. AbateIQ supports multi-floor workflows and consistent labeling so ACM locations and samples are easy to follow from field collection to final report.
